text: You can follow us on Twitter to receive exclusive tips and updates about Material-UI and the React ecosystem.

title: Let's translate!
text: 帮助 Material-UI 将文档翻译成中文. 🇨🇳

title: Adobe XD
text: Welcoming Adobe XD to the Material-UI design assets family. 600+ Material-UI symbols, handcrafted in Adobe XD, ready to help turn your imagination into reality!
